entry.tran: （中世纪欧洲宫廷的）逗乐小丑，弄臣
entry.def: In the courts of kings and queens in medieval Europe, the jester was the person whose job was to do silly things in order to make people laugh.

means.word_mean: 1. a professional clown employed to entertain a king or nobleman in the middle ages
